Question: Letron Music Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Letron Music Inc.

Product: Letron APP

- The Letron APP will be showcased at CES 2024 featuring boundless possibilities of music and AI technology.
- Venue: Eureka Park, Hall G, VenetianExpo, Booth 62700, No. AR02
- Date: 2024.01.09-01.12
- The Letron team has been recommended by TTA (Taiwan Tech Arena) to participate in the CES 2024 TTA booth in Eureka Park.
- Attended the CES Bootcamp organized by TTA and 500 Global, gaining valuable knowledge and skills for the CES showcase and future endeavors.
- The Letron Music team is looking forward to the arrival of CES 2024.
